intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What is your favorite way to spend time with family?
Where do you want to go this year?

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to eat?

respond_situations.description: You are buying a shirt. You want to know the price.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are in a café. You can choose a drink.

ask_situations.instruction: At a store, ask the cashier for the price of an item.
At school, ask your friend for help with homework.
You want to invite your friends to a birthday party. ..

listening_script.text: I take photos with my phone. I like to take selfies. I also take pictures of my friends. We smile and have fun. Photos help us remember nice times.

questions.question: What do I take photos with?
Who do I take pictures of?

follow_up_questions.question: Why do you like this room?
Where is this room in your house?
How do you feel in this room?
